description: This source file provides utility functions for handling cryptographic operations related to BigNum and Prime data structures in the context of SSLeay within the ANSC framework. It includes functions to convert BIGNUMs to internal integer and prime representations, with proper initializations and checks.

methods.name: void AnscCryptoPubBigNum2Integer(BIGNUM * pBigNum,PANSC_CRYPTO_INTEGER pInteger)
methods.description: Converts a BIGNUM to an internal integer representation, initializing the output and calling a helper function for conversion.

methods.name: void AnscCryptoPubBigNum2Prime(BIGNUM * pBigNum,PANSC_CRYPTO_PRIME pPrime)
methods.description: Converts a BIGNUM to an internal prime representation, initializing the output and calling a helper function for conversion.
